history.entry: 1.0.0RC3 March 4, 2018 Typos and reserved word usage fixed. Adaptations and more artwork to allow MacOS bundling. License headers added to files. Added text for Export Administration Regulations email notice of exemption from export restictions for publically available encryption source code. Minor text updates to help and Readme.html

1.0.0RC2 January 22, 2018 Bugfix to randomize key to make sure that the central byte of the previous randomized chunk is used to pick the next chunk size. This makes the program incompatible with version 1.0.0RC1 and all previous versions. Modified About Box to use information from this Verison.xml file. Git repository cleanup.
1.0.0RC1 January 18, 2018 Initial wx based graphical user interface version incorporating the python scripts randomizekey.py, encryptutil.py and decryptutil.py.
